CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Plan_Date__c)), ISBLANK(Plan_End_Date__c)) , TODAY() - Plan_Date__c, IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Plan_Date__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(Plan_End_Date__c))) , Plan_End_Date__c - Plan_Date__c,0))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days between the Plan Start Date and Plan End Date. If the Plan End Date is blank, this field shows the number of days between the Plan Start Date and the today's date.
CustomField.label: Plan Age (Formula)
